name: ARYAN SINGHAL

full_output.summary: Dedicated Computer Science undergraduate with experience as a Python developer. Proficient in Python, Flask, Mongodb, SQL, HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Strong foundation in RDBMS, OS, and OOPs principles. Committed to taking ownership of projects and leading teams to success.
social_work: Active in college events, I've been part of the core committee for tech and cultural fests, and have contributed to social causes like blood donation camps.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering

projects.name: Attendance Management System
projects.description: Developed an automated attendance management system using Embedded C++, MySQL, RFID, and NodeMCU, with data integration to Google Sheets. Got it patented for the innovation and authored a research paper accepted by the ICT4SD conference. This project enhances attendance tracking efficiency for educational institutions.

projects.name: Hotel Management Website
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive hotel management website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL. The system features an intuitive booking process, secure admin panel, easy cancellations, and integrated payment gateway. Enhanced the efficiency of hotel operations and customer satisfaction, leading to increased online bookings and streamlined management.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a movie recommendation system using Python, SQL and machine learning techniques, leveraging CountVectorizer for text processing. The system analyzes movie plots to suggest similar films, enhancing user experience with personalized recommendations based on content similarity.

experiences.description: Led the development of an intelligent chatbot that recommends songs based on sentiment analysis. Ensured robust and scalable code while collaborating effectively with the team.

full_output.name: ARYAN SINGHAL

degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering
